Alarm Zone provides easy to use, yet sophisticated and simple home security equipment to protect your home. Get wireless home security equipment that will help protect your home and family.

The command station of your panel will control all your sensors. Your sensors are place in all zones and areas of your home.

Full Zone Protection

When it comes to protecting your home, make sure you cover all zones and areas. Protect all windows, doors, the interior of your home, place smoke detectors strategically, carbon monoxide sensors, flood sensors, and various other sensors to guarantee Full Zone protection.

Sensors

Sensors are the small pieces of protection that provide peace of mind of your home and family. The sensors are placed strategically throughout the home to protect all zones of your home. They can be the small more common sensors on the doors or window, or even smoke detectors and glass break sensors.

GPS

Geo-location tracking can come in handy when it comes to protecting your vehicle and anyone who drives it. If you have a teen or young driver you are worried about, you can track their every location with a GPS device from Alarm Zone. This also comes in handy for elderly drivers and for company vehicles. Monitor and track exact location with our GPS device.
